alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:23PM EST until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Lamprey River Near Newmarket affecting Strafford and Rockingham Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lamprey River near Newmarket. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Bennett Road in Durham starts to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 9.6 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
